<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knowledge is Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=2861) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 45 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

When you critically succeed at a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) check about a creature, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against the creature, to your AC against its next attack roll, and to your save against its next effect requiring a save. If you share this information with your allies, they gain the benefits as well. If not used, these bonuses end after 1 minute.
name: Knowledge is Power
